review:
I had Ligment tear and i approached Dr.Neeraj Bijalani.He has done both ACL/MCL Reconstruction for my right knee.The surgery was perfect and it worked very well.Now i am able to go to my work and walk well.Thank you Dr.neeraj and Practo for the good thing you have done.

Ramesh polur

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Very good and experience docter . must visit . Thanks Vishal Nigam Son of Liza Nigam

review: Prescribed tests and no meds. Need to visit him again. Please correct your fee to rs 800 + rs500 when i go back with test results for meds. Seems friendly and affable. The clinic is little hard to find, the first time.
reply_text:
We are very sorry for the inconvenience caused to you 
We don't charge the patient second time just for showing the reports if you visit within 5 days and according to our records we have not yet seen your Mrs lajwanti again 
Also we had prescribed two tablets for her pain relief according to our records 
However we would surely like to see your mother again with the reports if you would like to visit again kindly schedule an appointment with the clinic
